QuestData.Title: The First Step
QuestData.Description: To perform the ritual you've requested - and perhaps some more rituals in the near future - we're going to need blood. The Blasted Lands are filled with every type of reagent we might need for our blood magic... it's just a matter of the correct combination.$b$b<Lynnore quickly confers with Drazial for a moment.>$b$bBasilisks and hyenas, even amounts. And we're going to need plenty of it. Head east, to the center of the Blasted Lands. And don't forget... you can use that teleporter!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 9 vials of Snickerfang Hyena Blood and 9 vials of Redstone Basilisk Blood.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ogre blood only takes you so far. Do you have it?
QuestData.RewardText: <Lynnore eyes the blood hungrily.>$b$bMore than enough, and still warm! Now, let's get this ritual started, shall we?
